summary:
WARNING!!!!

This only makes Summermyst playable in Requiem. It does nothing to rebalance it for Requiem.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center]!!WARNING!![/center][/size]
[center][size=3]This mod was intended for personal use, it in no way balances [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3959191]EnaiSiaion[/url]'s[/size][size=4] [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80918/?tab=1&navtag=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D80918%26preview%3D&pUp=1][size=4]Summermyst[/size] [/url][size=3]for Requiem.[/size]

~~~~-------------------------------~~~~[/center]
[size=3]I made this patch for personal use, but since there is nothing up on the Nexus I figured this is at least one step up from that.  The only thing this mod does is make Summermyst playable with Requim.


[size=5][b]DETAILS[/b][/size]:
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Summermyst has 10,000~ leveled items in leveled lists             ---------------------> I ran a script to delevel them.   
[/size]
[*][size=3]Summermyst edits a few dozen Magic Effects that undo Requiem changes. -------> I merged the changes.
[/size]
[*][size=3]Summermyst has many, many magic effects that aren't made for Requiem. -------> !!!! [b]I CAN"T FIX THIS !!!![/b][/size]
[/list]
[size=3]This took me half an hour or so to do, hope it ends up saving some other people the time.[/size]
author: Alistat
